definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be hostile to (As. aibu (v. Dl:w), enemy = [[אׂיֵב]])—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. † [[וְאָיַבְתִּ֫י]] Ex 23:22; Pt. [[אוֹיֵב]] ([[אׂיֵב]]) Ex 15:6 +; sf. [[אׂיְבִי]]([[אוֹיְבִי]])) 2Sa 22:18 = Ps 18:18 +; f. sf. [[אׂיַבְתִּי]] Mic 7:8, Mic 7:10; [[אׂיִבְךָ]] Ex 23:4 +, etc.; pl. [[אׂויְבִים]] Ps 68:24, Ps 127:5; [[אׂיְבִים]] Ps 139:22, etc.;—be hostile to, treat as enemy Ex 23:22 (E, Cov't code) [[וְאָיַבְתִּ֫י אֶת־אׂיְבֶיךָ וְחַרְתִּ֫י אֶת־חׂרְרֶיךָ]] (subj. ´[[י]]); elsewhere Pt. 1Sa 18:29 [[וַיְהִי שָׁאוּל אׂיֵב אֶת־דָּוִד]]; usually as subst. & mostly sf.; enemy, of personal foe Ex 23:4 (E ‖[[שׂנֵא]] v:Ex 23:5) Nu 35:23 (P) 1Sa 19:17 (cf. 1Sa 18:29) 1Sa 24:5, 1Sa 24:20, 2Sa 4:8, 1Ki 21:20, Job 27:7, Ps 54:9, Ps 55:13 (‖[[מְשַׂנֵּא]]; opp. [[אַלּוּף]], [[מְיֻדָּע]] v:Ps 55:14) Mic 2:8, Pr 16:7, Pr 24:17 + ; in sim. Je 30:14 ([[מַכַּת אוֹיֵב]]); of public national enemy, sg. Ju Jdg 16:23, Jdg 16:24; coll. Ex 15:6, Ex 15:9, De 33:27, Na 3:11, 2Ch 6:24 +; personif. Mic 7:8, Mic 7:10; more oft. pl. Ex 23:22 (E) Le 26:7 f (H) Nu 10:9 (P) De 1:42, De 6:19, Je 15:9, Je 34:20, Je 34:21 +; of enemies of God, as protector of his people Nu 10:35 (J) Ju Jdg 5:31, 1Sa 30:26, 2Sa 18:19, Ps 66:3, Ps 68:1, Ps 68:22, Na 1:2, Na 1:8, Is 66:6 +; as morally supreme Job 13:24, Job 33:10, Ps 37:20, Ps 92:10, Ps 92:10 +; of God as enemy of rebellious people Is 63:10, in sim. La 2:4, La 2:5.
